amendment.description: Amendment sought to improve quality and quantity of information shared about vehicle safety issues among auto manufacturers, NHTSA, and consumers and also sought to improve the quality and quantity of safety information provided about used cars at point of sale.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 15 printed in Part B of House Report 114-326 to the Senate amendment to the text to improve quality and quantity of information shared about vehicle safety issues among auto manufacturers, NHTSA, and consumers. Amendment also improves the quality and quantity of safety information provided about used cars at point of sale.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A088) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 251 (Roll no. 619).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schakowsky amendment (A088) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 251 (Roll no. 619).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A088) offered by Ms. Schakowsky.
